name: Stephen Onnen
title: Software Engineer
bio: Stephen served 11 years active duty as an Infantryman, Sniper Section Leader, and Ranger Instructor. While serving he graduated from Ranger School, Sniper School, the Marine Corps Mountain Scout Sniper Course, Pathfinder School, Airborne School, and Air Assault School. He completed three combat deployments, twice to Baghdad Iraq and once to eastern Afghanistan. Since leaving the military Stephen has worked as a Software Engineer and is currently the Director of Engineering at a Fintech company.
